publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6052.1 Charlie Gordon: Fair Fares for Glaswegians—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6052) in the name of Anne McLaughlin, insert at end ", and regrets the lack of support from the SNP for the proposed Regulation of Bus Services (Scotland) Bill, which would have strengthened local authorities’ powers to regulate bus fares." Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Patricia Ferguson*, Des McNulty*, Mary Mulligan*, John Park*, Jackie Baillie*
